name: Wonderland.
tagline: We make you more memorable through design
description:
Wonderland is a human experience design studio. At the centre of everything we do is the consumer and you. 
We work with businesses to develop products born from genuine consumer insight, secured by strategy and defined by clear, measurable objectives. We make beautiful things that are relevant, have impact, create meaning and deliver.
 
Some of our clients; TomTom, DXC, ABN AMRO, Tikkie, Nomads, Fournier
 
Our  main services:
Discovery & Insight
Strategy
Experience Design
Change & Transformation
United by our shared passion to develop human-centred experiences that explore possibility, Wonderlanders bring distinction to the web through their talent, knowledge and creativity.
